name: Toleko's Tale
description:
Toleko's Tale is a 2-D vertical shooter game inspired by ZUN"s touhou project. This is done for our university software engineering project. Currently, its on beta mode. Some of the art will be updated eventually.

Try to use the keyboard to navigate the UI, mouse clicks may have bugs.

You can download the window exe/zip file here: 

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1vVyAZV_AACt-VNXjGZtgBUg9-VZLPmTa

Tip: You can use Z key for dialogue if Enter doesn't work.

You can submit feedbacks and bug reports under 

https://forms.gle/ZA5DvZqePVYmCtDj6
